participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake values family and tradition, often expressing a strong sense of community.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i only listen to country music.

participant_2.name: Claire Johnson
participant_2.personality: Creative and compassionate, Claire has a passion for music and enjoys sharing her talents with others.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
